channel.title: Companion scape new server 747
channel.description:
Welcome to the new Runescape Private Server CompanionScape!
A home full of custum Minigames, Bosses, Training places and more!
CompanionScape offers alot of awesome content and updates everyday.
This is a brand new server, Server is not 100% yet, we still need to fix some things ingame and adding an donationsystem etc. but it's absolutely playable!
as a RSPS community, we are here to make sure your game play is to the finest of your satisfaction.
I (Cookie), desided to make the server mostly for player who don't really wan't to donate/ can't afford it to donate. wich means you can get most items ingame. by different monsters.
Now lets get this over with and see what this server offers.
I dident added alot of text i did it with pics so u can see what we got.
Webclient
[url=http://companionscape.x10.mx/webclient/index.php]Companion Scape[/url]
Download
[url=http://companionscape.x10.mx/webclient/client.jar]http://companionscape.x10.mx/webclient/client.jar[/url]
Website
[url=http://companionscape.x10.mx/index.php]Companion Scape[/url]
Current staff:
Cookie - Owner
Deathkil - Co-Owner
Open - Admin
Open - Mod
Rearmor - support
Gulashman - support ~ [URL=http://s608.photobucket.com/user/deathkil/media/pic5_zpsecb392ef.png.html][IMG]http://i608.photobucket.com/albums/tt161/deathkil/pic5_zpsecb392ef.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s608.photobucket.com/user/deathkil/media/pic_zps07bf34f5.png.html][IMG]http://i608.photobucket.com/albums/tt161/deathkil/pic_zps07bf34f5.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s608.photobucket.com/user/deathkil/media/pic4_zpsf538dce9.png.html][IMG]http://i608.photobucket.com/albums/tt161/deathkil/pic4_zpsf538dce9.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s608.photobucket.com/user/deathkil/media/pic6_zps39b0a374.png.html][IMG]http://i608.photobucket.com/albums/tt161/deathkil/pic6_zps39b0a374.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s608.photobucket.com/user/deathkil/media/pic24_zpsa7d3b263.png.html][IMG]http://i608.photobucket.com/albums/tt161/deathkil/pic24_zpsa7d3b263.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s608.photobucket.com/user/deathkil/media/pic3_zpsfe832492.png.html][IMG]http://i608.photobucket.com/albums/tt161/deathkil/pic3_zpsfe832492.png[/img][/URL] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2lm3qkn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/oqb09h.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/1045k7n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/otjjub.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/v4vyph.jpg[/img] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXq6NksSy-k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vXq6NksSy-k[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycVE9dBoV6k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ycVE9dBoV6k[/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eMDe5fm7BdM]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eMDe5fm7BdM[/url]
WAY more coming soon!
Join NOW!
Greetings,
Cookie Owner of Companion Scape Deathkil Co-Owner of Companion Scape
PS. if you want more pictures, post Suggestion below.

item.title: Companion scape new server 747
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

I joined, looks good so far. Easy leveling, off-hand weapons, easy item finding in stores and stuff. Pretty neat job.

Read full topic
